long_description: Luxurious leather and a supportive fit make the Merrell Tortugus Flip-Flops an essential for sunny afternoons strolling through the park and down the boardwalk. Full-grain leather uppers have Lycra(R) neoprene lining for padded comfort; treated with Aegis(R) antimicrobial treatment to help prevent odors from developing. EVA midsoles with Air Cushion(R) shock-absorbent heel pockets offer all-day cushioning comfort. Injection-molded nylon arch shanks add stability and support on uneven terrain. Durable rubber outsoles deliver reliable traction on all types of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Luxurious leather and a supportive fit make the Merrell Tortugus Flip-Flops an essential for sunny afternoons strolling through the park and down the boardwalk.
